不.definition: no; not so; (bound form) not; un-

不一而足.definition: by no means an isolated case; numerous

不一致字.definition: (orthography) inconsistent words (e.g. "through", "bough" and "rough", where "-ough" is not pronounced the same in each case); inconsistent characters (e.g. 流[liu2], 梳[shu1] and 毓[yu4], which are pronounced differently from each other even though they all have the same notional phonetic component)

不三不四.definition: (idiom) dubious; shady; neither one thing nor the other; neither fish nor fowl; nondescript

不下.definition: to be not less than (a certain quantity, amount etc)

不下於.definition: as many as; no less than; not inferior to; as good as; on a par with

不中用.definition: unfit for anything; no good; useless; (of a sick person) beyond hope

不主故常.definition: not to stick to the old conventions

不久.definition: not long (after); before too long; soon; soon after

不乾不淨，吃了沒病.pinyin: bù qián bù jìng ， chī le méi bìng
不乾不淨，吃了沒病.definition: a little dirt never killed anybody (proverb); a couple of germs won't do you any harm

不了.definition: (as a resultative verb suffix) unable to (do sth); (pattern: {verb} + 個|个[ge5] + ~) without end; incessantly

不了了之.definition: to settle a matter by leaving it unsettled; to end up with nothing definite

不予理會.definition: to ignore; to brush off; to dismiss; to pay no attention to

不事生產.definition: not to do anything productive; to idle away one's time

不二價.definition: one price for all; fixed price

不二法門.definition: the one and only way; the only proper course to take

不亞.definition: no less than; not inferior to

不亞於.definition: no less than; not inferior to

不亢不卑.definition: neither haughty nor humble; neither overbearing nor servile; neither supercilious nor obsequious

不亦樂乎.definition: lit. isn't that a joy? (quote from Confucius); fig. (jocular) extremely; awfully

不以人廢言.definition: not to reject a word because of the speaker (idiom, from Analects); to judge on the merits of the case rather than preference between advisers

不以為然.definition: not to accept as correct (idiom); to object; to disapprove; to take exception to

不以物喜，不以己悲.pinyin: bù yǐ wù xǐ ， bù yǐ jǐ bēi
不以物喜，不以己悲.definition: not to become attached to material things, not to pity oneself

不以規矩，不能成方圓.pinyin: bù yǐ guī jǔ ， bù néng chéng fāng yuán

不以詞害誌.definition: don't let rhetoric spoil the message (idiom); don't get carried away with flowery speech to the detriment of what you want to say

不以辭害志.definition: don't let rhetoric spoil the message (idiom); don't get carried away with flowery speech to the detriment of what you want to say

不住.definition: (verb complement) unable to firmly or securely (grasp, recall etc); repeatedly; continuously; constantly

不作死就不會死.pinyin: bù zuò sǐ jiù bù huì sǐ
不作死就不會死.definition: serves you right for doing sth so stupid (Internet slang)

不依.definition: not to comply; not to go along with; not to let off easily; not to let sb get away with it

不依不饒.definition: not to overlook, nor spare (idiom); unwilling to forgive; to treat severely without listening to excuses

不便.definition: inconvenient; inappropriate; unsuitable; short of cash

不信任動議.definition: motion of no confidence (against the government, in parliamentary debates)

不修邊幅.definition: not care about one's appearance (idiom); slovenly in dress and manner

不值一駁.definition: (idiom) (of an argument) not even worthy of a rebuttal

不假思索.definition: (idiom) to act without taking time to think; to react instantly; to fire from the hip

不偏斜.definition: not leaning to one side; impartial; even-handed

不做聲.definition: keep silent; not say a word

不傷脾胃.definition: lit. doesn't hurt the spleen or the stomach; fig. something that is not critical

不僅.definition: not just; not limited to; (as a correlative conjunction) not only (..., but also ...)

不像樣.definition: in no shape to be seen; unpresentable; beyond recognition

不光.definition: not the only one; not only

不克.definition: cannot; to not be able (to); to be unable to

不免一死.definition: cannot avoid being killed; cannot escape death; to be mortal

不兒.definition: (coll.) no (contracted form of 不是[bu4 shi4])

不分.definition: not to distinguish; to make no distinction; (LGBT slang) versatile (open to either penetrative or receptive role)

不分伯仲.definition: lit. unable to distinguish eldest brother from second brother (idiom); they are all equally excellent; nothing to choose between them

不分勝敗.definition: to not be able to distinguish who's winning

不分勝負.definition: unable to determine victory or defeat (idiom); evenly matched; to come out even; to tie; to draw

不分皂白.definition: not distinguishing black or white (idiom); not to distinguish between right and wrong

不可抗拒.definition: act of God; force majeure (law); irresistible (idiom)

不失為.definition: can still be considered (to be...); may after all be accepted as

不是一家人不進一家門.definition: people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom); marriages are predestined; people marry because they share common traits

不是冤家不聚頭.pinyin: bù shì yuān jiā bù jù tóu
不是冤家不聚頭.definition: destiny will make enemies meet (idiom); (often said about lovers who have a disagreement)

不是吃素的.definition: not to be trifled with; to be reckoned with

不是味兒.definition: not the right flavor; not quite right; a bit off; fishy; queer; amiss; feel bad; be upset

不是東西.definition: (derog.) to be a good-for-nothing; worthless nobody; no-good

不是滋味.definition: to be upset; to feel disgusted

不是話.definition: see 不像話|不像话[bu4 xiang4 hua4]

不是魚死就是網破.pinyin: bú shì yú sǐ jiù shì wǎng pò
不是魚死就是網破.definition: lit. either the fish dies or the net gets torn (idiom); fig. it's a life-and-death struggle; it's either him or me

不時.definition: from time to time; now and then; occasionally; frequently

不時之需.definition: a possible period of want or need

不暇.definition: to have no time (for sth); to be too busy (to do sth)

不會.definition: improbable; unlikely; will not (act, happen etc); not able; not having learned to do sth; (coll.) (Tw) don't mention it; not at all

不服.definition: not to accept sth; to want to have sth overruled or changed; to refuse to obey or comply; to refuse to accept as final; to remain unconvinced by; not to give in to

不服氣.definition: unwilling to concede; defiant; indignant; to find it galling

不服水土.definition: (of a stranger) not accustomed to the climate of a new place; not acclimatized

不服罪.definition: to deny a crime; to plead not guilty

不期然而然.definition: happen unexpectedly; turn out contrary to one's expectations

不期而遇.definition: meet by chance; have a chance encounter

不材.definition: untalented; I; me (humble); also written 不才[bu4 cai2]

不標準.definition: nonstandard; incorrect; (of one's speech) poor; woeful (not in keeping with correct pronunciation or usage)

不歡而散.definition: to part on bad terms; (of a meeting etc) to break up in discord

不止.definition: incessantly; without end; more than; not limited to

不止一次.definition: many times; on more than one occasion

不歸路.definition: road to ruin; course of action from which there is no turning back

不死不休.definition: to fight to one's last gasp

不求收獲.definition: not expecting any reward; not asking for favors

不求有功，但求無過.pinyin: bù qiú yǒu gōng ， dàn qiú wú guò
不求有功，但求無過.definition: lit. not aiming to achieve the best possible result, but rather trying to avoid making mistakes (idiom); fig. to take a risk-averse approach

不求甚解.definition: lit. not requiring a detailed understanding (idiom); only looking for an overview; not bothered with the details; superficial; content with shallow understanding

不治.definition: to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help

不治而癒.definition: to recover spontaneously (from an illness); to get better without medical treatment

不減當年.definition: (of one's skills, appearance etc) not to have deteriorated a bit; to be as (good, vigorous etc) as ever

不測.definition: unexpected; measureless; unexpected circumstance; contingency; mishap

不溫不火.definition: (of sales, TV show ratings etc) lukewarm; moderate; so-so; (of a person) calm; unruffled

不為人知.definition: not known to anyone; secret; unknown

不為左右袒.definition: to remain neutral in a quarrel (idiom)

不為已甚.definition: refrain from going to extremes in meting out punishment; not be too hard on subject

不為過.definition: not an exaggeration; not excessive; not wide of the mark

不為酒困.definition: not a slave to the bottle; able to enjoy alcohol in moderation; able to hold one's drink

不無小補.definition: not be without some advantage; be of some help

不然.definition: not so; no; or else; otherwise; if not; How about ...?

不爭.definition: widely known; incontestable; undeniable; to not strive for; to not contend for

不爭氣.definition: to be disappointing; to fail to live up to expectations

不爽.definition: not well; out of sorts; in a bad mood; without discrepancy; accurate

不理.definition: to refuse to acknowledge; to pay no attention to; to take no notice of; to ignore

不理不睬.definition: to completely ignore (idiom); to pay no attention to; not to be in the least concerned about

不甘.definition: unreconciled to; not resigned to; unwilling

不甘人後.definition: (idiom) not want to be outdone; not content to lag behind

不甘寂寞.definition: unwilling to remain lonely or idle; unwilling to be left out

不甘後人.definition: (idiom) not want to be outdone; not content to lag behind

不甘心.definition: not reconciled to; not resigned to

不甘於.definition: unwilling to accept; not content with (a subservient role, a mediocre result etc)

不用客氣.definition: you're welcome; don't mention it; no need to stand on ceremony

不用說.definition: needless to say; it goes without saying

不畏強暴.definition: not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence

不畏強權.definition: not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence

不當一回事.definition: not regard as a matter (of any importance)

不當家不知柴米貴.pinyin: bù dāng jiā bù zhī chái mǐ guì
不當家不知柴米貴.definition: a person who doesn't manage a household would not be aware how expensive it is (idiom)

不疾不徐.definition: neither too fast nor too slow (idiom)

不痛不癢.definition: lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what; fig. not getting to any matter of substance; scratching the surface; superficial; perfunctory

不登大雅之堂.pinyin: bù dēng dà yǎ zhī táng
不登大雅之堂.definition: lit. not fit for elegant hall (of artwork); not presentable; coarse; unrefined

不盡然.definition: not always; not entirely; not necessarily so; not entirely correct

不相干.definition: to be irrelevant; to have nothing to do with

不省人事.definition: to lose consciousness; unconscious; in a coma

不看僧面看佛面.pinyin: bù kàn sēng miàn kàn fó miàn
不看僧面看佛面.definition: lit. not for the monk's sake but for the Buddha's sake (idiom); fig. (to do sth for sb) out of deference to sb else

不眠不休.definition: without stopping to sleep or have a rest (idiom)

不睦.definition: to not get along well; to be at odds

不瞅不睬.definition: (idiom) to ignore completely; to pay no attention to

不知.definition: not to know; unaware; unknowingly; fig. not to admit (defeat, hardships, tiredness etc)

不知丁董.definition: forgetting the fate of Ding and Dong (idiom); unheeding the lessons of the past

不知凡幾.definition: one can't tell how many; numerous similar cases

不知利害.definition: see 不知好歹[bu4 zhi1 hao3 dai3]

不知天高地厚.pinyin: bù zhī tiān gāo dì hòu
不知天高地厚.definition: not to know the immensity of heaven and earth; an exaggerated opinion of one's own abilities

不知好歹.definition: unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom); not to know what's good for one; unable to recognize others' good intentions

不知就裡.definition: unaware of the inner workings; naive; unwitting

不知所云.definition: to not know what sb is driving at; to be unintelligible

不知所以.definition: (idiom) to not know the reason; (idiom) to not know what to do

不知所措.definition: not knowing what to do (idiom); at one's wits' end; embarrassed and at a complete loss

不知所謂.definition: nonsense; nonsensical; incomprehensible; to make no sense

不知羞恥.definition: to have no sense of shame; brazen

不知者不罪.definition: One who does not know is not guilty; If one does not know any better, one cannot be held responsible

不知輕重.definition: lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things; naive; doesn't know who's who; no sense of priorities

不知進退.definition: not knowing when to come or leave (idiom); with no sense of propriety

不破不立.definition: without destruction there can be no construction

不確定性原理.pinyin: bù què dìng xìng yuán lǐ

不禁.definition: can't help (doing sth); can't refrain from

不符.definition: inconsistent; not in agreement with; not agree or tally with; not conform to

不第.definition: to fail the civil service examination (in imperial China)

不等邊三角形.pinyin: bù děng biān sān jiǎo xíng

不算.definition: to not calculate; to not count; to not be considered (as); to have no weight

不管.definition: not to be concerned; regardless of; no matter

不管三七二十一.pinyin: bù guǎn sān qī èr shí yī
不管三七二十一.definition: regardless of the consequences; recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast

不管不顧.definition: (idiom) to pay scant regard to (sth); (idiom) unheeding; reckless

不管怎樣.definition: in any case; no matter what

不管白貓黑貓，捉住老鼠就是好貓.pinyin: bù guǎn bái māo hēi māo ， zhuō zhù lǎo shǔ jiù shì hǎo māo
不管白貓黑貓，捉住老鼠就是好貓.definition: it doesn't matter whether a cat is white or black; as long as it catches mice it's a good cat (variant of a Sichuanese saying used in a speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1962, usually associated with his economic reforms starting in 1978, in which pragmatism was favored over ideological purity)

不簡單.definition: not simple; rather complicated; remarkable; marvelous

不約而同.definition: (idiom) (of two or more people) to take the same action without prior consultation; (usu. used adverbially) all (or both) of them, independently; as if by prior agreement

不終天年.definition: to die before one's allotted lifespan has run its course (idiom)

不絕如縷.definition: hanging by a thread; very precarious; almost extinct; (of sound) linger on faintly

不絕於耳.definition: (of sound) to never stop; to fall incessantly on the ear; to linger on

不絕於途.definition: to come and go in an incessant stream

不給力.definition: lame (unimpressive); a huge letdown; not to try at all

不經一事，不長一智.pinyin: bù jīng yī shì ， bù zhǎng yī zhì
不經一事，不長一智.definition: lit. you can't gain knowledge without practical experience (idiom); fig. wisdom only comes with experience

不經意.definition: not paying attention; carelessly; by accident

不經意間.definition: without paying attention; without noticing; unconsciously; inadvertently

不緊不慢.definition: (idiom) to take one's time; unhurried; leisurely

不置可否.definition: decline to comment; not express an opinion; be noncommittal; hedge

不翼而飛.definition: to disappear without trace; to vanish all of a sudden; to spread fast; to spread like wildfire

不耐受.definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)

不聞不問.definition: not to hear, not to question (idiom); to show no interest in sth; uncritical; not in the least concerned

不聽老人言，吃虧在眼前.pinyin: bù tīng lǎo rén yán ， chī kuī zài yǎn qián
不聽老人言，吃虧在眼前.definition: (idiom) ignore your elders at your peril

不育.definition: to be infertile; to have no offspring

不能自已.definition: unable to control oneself; to be beside oneself

不脛而走.definition: to get round fast; to spread like wildfire

不自由，毋寧死.pinyin: bù zì yóu ， wú níng sǐ
不自由，毋寧死.definition: give me liberty or give me death

不自量.definition: not take a proper measure of oneself; to overrate one's own abilities

不至於.definition: unlikely to go so far as to; not as bad as

不致.definition: not in such a way as to; not likely to

不興.definition: out of fashion; outmoded; impermissible; can't

不舒服.definition: unwell; feeling ill; to feel uncomfortable; uneasy

不良人.definition: (Tang dynasty) official responsible for tracking down and arresting lawbreakers

不苟.definition: not lax; not casual; careful; conscientious

不若.definition: not as good as; not equal to; inferior

不菲.definition: considerable (cost etc); bountiful (crop etc); high (social status etc)

不落俗套.definition: to conform to no conventional pattern; unconventional; offbeat

不落痕跡.definition: to leave no trace; seamless; professional

不落窠臼.definition: not follow the beaten track; have an original style

不著痕跡.definition: to leave no trace; seamlessly; unobtrusively

不著邊際.definition: not to the point; wide of the mark; neither here nor there; irrelevant

不蒸饅頭爭口氣.pinyin: bù zhēng mán tóu zhēng kǒu qì
不蒸饅頭爭口氣.definition: not to be crushed (idiom); to be determined to have one's revenge

不虞.definition: unexpected; eventuality; contingency; not worry about

不虞匱乏.definition: (idiom) to have ample supplies (or money etc)

不行.definition: won't do; be out of the question; be no good; not work; not be capable

不行了.definition: (coll.) on the point of death; dying

不要在一棵樹上吊死.pinyin: bú yào zài yī kē shù shàng diào sǐ
不要在一棵樹上吊死.definition: don't insist on only taking one road to Rome (idiom); there's more than one way to skin a cat

不要緊.definition: unimportant; not serious; it doesn't matter; never mind; it looks all right, but

不要臉.definition: to have no sense of shame; shameless

不見.definition: not to see; not to meet; to have disappeared; to be missing

不見一點蹤影.pinyin: bù jiàn yī diǎn zōng yǐng

不見不散.definition: lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom); fig. Be sure to wait!; See you there!

不見了.definition: to have disappeared; to be missing; nowhere to be found

不見兔子不撒鷹.pinyin: bù jiàn tù zi bù sā yīng
不見兔子不撒鷹.definition: you don't release the hawk until you've seen the hare (idiom); one doesn't act before one is sure to succeed

不見天日.definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice

不見棺材不落淚.pinyin: bù jiàn guān cái bù luò lèi
不見棺材不落淚.definition: lit. not to shed a tear until one sees the coffin (idiom); fig. refuse to be convinced until one is faced with grim reality

不見經傳.definition: not found in the classics (idiom); unknown; unfounded; not authoritative

不規則三角形.pinyin: bù guī zé sān jiǎo xíng

不規則四邊形.pinyin: bù guī zé sì biān xíng

不解.definition: to not understand; to be puzzled by; indissoluble

不言不語.definition: to not say a word (idiom); to keep silent

不言而喻.definition: it goes without saying; it is self-evident

不計.definition: to disregard; to take no account of

不計其數.definition: lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless; innumerable

不記名.definition: see 無記名|无记名[wu2 ji4 ming2]

不許.definition: not to allow; must not; can't

不詳.definition: not in detail; not quite clear

不誤.definition: used in expressions of the form 照V不誤|照V不误[zhao4 xx5 bu4 wu4], in which V is a verb, 照[zhao4] means "as before", and the overall meaning is "carry on (doing sth) regardless" or "continue (to do sth) in spite of changed circumstances", e.g. 照買不誤|照买不误[zhao4 mai3 bu4 wu4], to keep on buying (a product) regardless (of price hikes)

不請自來.definition: to turn up without being invited; unsolicited

不論.definition: whatever; no matter what (who, how etc); regardless of; not to discuss

不諱.definition: without concealing anything; to pass away; to die

不諳水性.definition: to not know how to swim; to not be a strong swimmer

不謀而合.definition: to agree without prior consultation; to happen to hold the same view

不謝.definition: don't mention it; not at all

不識一丁.definition: total illiterate; unable to read the simplest characters

不識大體.definition: to fail to see the larger issue (idiom); to fail to grasp the big picture

不識好歹.definition: unable to tell good from bad (idiom); undiscriminating

不識廬山真面目.pinyin: bù shí lú shān zhēn miàn mù
不識廬山真面目.definition: lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain (idiom); fig. can't see the forest for the trees

不識抬舉.definition: fail to appreciate sb's kindness; not know how to appreciate favors

不識時務.definition: to show no understanding of the times (idiom); cannot adapt to current circumstances; not amenable to reason

不識時變.definition: to show no understanding of the times (idiom); cannot adapt to current circumstances; not amenable to reason

不識泰山.definition: can't recognize Mt Taishan (idiom); fig. not to recognize a famous person

不識高低.definition: can't recognize tall or short (idiom); doesn't know what's what

不讓鬚眉.definition: (idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc; to be a match for men; lit. not conceding to men (beard and eyebrows)

不費吹灰之力.pinyin: bù fèi chuī huī zhī lì
不費吹灰之力.definition: as easy as blowing off dust; effortless; with ease

不贊一詞.definition: to keep silent; to make no comment

不起眼.definition: unremarkable; nothing out of the ordinary

不起眼兒.definition: erhua variant of 不起眼[bu4 qi3 yan3]

不越雷池.definition: not overstepping the prescribed limits; to remain within bounds

不足.definition: insufficient; lacking; deficiency; not enough; inadequate; not worth; cannot; should not

不足為外人道.pinyin: bù zú wèi wài rén dào
不足為外人道.definition: (idiom) no need to tell others; let's keep this between ourselves; also pr. [bu4zu2 wei2 wai4ren2 dao4]

不足為慮.definition: to give no cause for anxiety; nothing to worry about

不足為訓.definition: not to be taken as an example; not an example to be followed; not to be taken as authoritative

不足道.definition: inconsiderable; of no consequence; not worth mentioning

不足齒數.definition: not worth mentioning; not worth considering

不輕饒.definition: not to forgive easily; not to let off; (You, He) won't get away with it!

不辨菽麥.definition: lit. cannot tell beans from wheat (idiom); fig. ignorant of practical matters

不迭.definition: cannot cope; find it too much; incessantly

不送.definition: don't bother to see me out

不通.definition: to be obstructed; to be blocked up; to be impassable; to make no sense; to be illogical

不速而至.definition: to arrive without invitation; unexpected guest; unwanted presence

不逮捕特權.definition: the right of immunity from arrest afforded by the Taiwan ROC Constitution, for the duration of meetings, unless caught actually committing a crime, to members of the National Assembly, the Legislative Yuan, or a supervisory committee

不遂.definition: to fail; to fail to materialize; not to get one's way

不過.definition: only; merely; no more than; but; however; anyway (to get back to a previous topic); cannot be more (after adjectival)

不過如此.definition: (idiom) nothing more than this; that's all; no big deal; not very impressive

不過意.definition: to be sorry; to feel apologetic

不過爾爾.definition: not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre; nothing out of the ordinary

不遑.definition: to have no time to (do sth)

不遑多讓.definition: lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom); fig. not to be outdone; not to yield to one's opponents

不違農時.definition: not miss the farming season; do farm work in the right season

不遠千里.definition: make light of traveling a thousand li; go to the trouble of traveling a long distance

不遺餘力.definition: to spare no pains or effort (idiom); to do one's utmost

不避斧鉞.definition: not trying to avoid the battle-ax (idiom); not afraid of dying in combat; not afraid of being executed

不避艱險.definition: shrink or flinch from no difficulty or danger; make light of difficulties and dangers

不醉不歸.definition: lit. to not go home until drunk (idiom); fig. let's make a night of it!

不錯.definition: correct; right; not bad; pretty good

不長眼睛.definition: see 沒長眼睛|没长眼睛[mei2 zhang3 yan3 jing5]

不開竅.definition: unable to understand; can't get the point

不隨大流.definition: not following the crowd; to go against the tide

不雅觀.definition: offensive to the eye; unbecoming; unsightly; ungainly

不離兒.definition: not bad; pretty good; pretty close

不露聲色.definition: not show one's feeling or intentions

不題.definition: we will not elaborate on that (used as pluralis auctoris)

不顧一切.definition: (idiom) to disregard all negative considerations; to cast aside all concerns

不顧前後.definition: regardless of what's before or after (idiom); rushing blindly into sth

不顧大局.definition: to give no consideration to the bigger picture (usually implying selfishness)

不顯山不露水.pinyin: bù xiǎn shān bù lù shuǐ
不顯山不露水.definition: lit. to not show the mountain and to not reveal the water (idiom); fig. to hide the key facts

不食人間煙火.pinyin: bù shí rén jiān yān huǒ
不食人間煙火.definition: otherworldly; detached from the mundane concerns of ordinary life

不飽和脂肪酸.pinyin: bù bǎo hé zhī fáng suān

不首先使用.definition: no first use (policy for nuclear weapons); NFU

不香嗎.definition: (slang) would be better (abbr. for 這錢買排骨它不香嗎|这钱买排骨它不香吗[zhe4 qian2 mai3 pai2 gu3 ta1 bu4 xiang1 ma5] for that money, a pork cutlet would be more appetizing, would it not?)

不體面.definition: to not appear to be decent or respectful; shameful

不齒.definition: to despise; to hold in contempt
